short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically logs you in into Blackboard --
 made with ❤️ by @fredericocurti

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is made for people that are lazy and hate filling the BlackBoard's system login/password every single time, something we students do many times a day. It only  works on Insper's BlackBoard website, but you are free to request any other university's portal that uses the system :)
